Articles.Content:
I've been building replicas and decided to post them to the forums so heres my MiG 15 (i'm new here so if i do something wrong, tell me)

 Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-15

![tF4pu6v.png](http://i.imgur.com/tF4pu6v.png)

![C5kVdrW.png](http://i.imgur.com/C5kVdrW.png)![Jw96low.png](http://i.imgur.com/Jw96low.png)![x5CsWnD.png](http://i.imgur.com/x5CsWnD.png)

I tried my best and i'm happy with the results its very maneuverable and fast,...but Maybe...maybe its too fast...scratches chin while thinking about potatoes then discovers you can never go too fast

It does use mods, but i will probably build a stock version of this craft after i finish my MiG21, Maybe
